document.docAuthor: De Moraes, Gilberto J., Britto, Erika P. J., Mineiro, Jefferson L. De C. & Halliday, Bruce
document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the mite families Ascidae Voigts & Oudemans, Blattisociidae Garman and Melicharidae Hirschmann (Acari: Mesostigmata)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the mite families Ascidae Voigts & Oudemans, Blattisociidae Garman and Melicharidae Hirschmann (Acari: Mesostigmata)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Proctolaelaps productus
Berlese, 1923
, by monotypy.

by

;

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:

Dugès 1834
, by original monotypy.

Type species:
Gamasus cossi Dugès
, by monotypy.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

: 411

by

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Garmania ( Garmaniella ) longisetosa
Westerboer, 1963

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paraproctolaelaps
Bregetova, 1977 a
: 217
(Synonymy by Karg, 1985 : 188 ; Halliday et al ., 1998 : 28 ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Proctolaelaps intermedius
Athias-Henriot, 1959
, by original designation.

NOTES : (a)
Bregetova ( 1977 a: 211 )
considered
Mucroseius
to be a junior synonym of
Proctolaelaps
. We adopted the interpretation of
Lindquist & Wu ( 1991 : 900 )
and Halliday et al . ( 1998 : 2 ), considering them to be distinct genera; (b) according to Halliday et al . ( 1998 : 28 ),
Proctolaelaps ( Proctofissus )
is an unavailable name because no type species was designated.
